scripts.start: npm run watch & NODE_PATH=./src/js: NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
scripts.watch: watchify -o public/js/bundle.js -v -d src/js/app.js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-css: node-sass --output-style compressed src/scss/style.scss dist/buffer-style.min.css && cp dist/buffer-style.min.css public/css/buffer-style.min.css
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/js/app.js > public/js/bundle.js && npm run build-css
